query: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.coupleId, c.id as couple_id, c.user1Id, c.user2Id, c.status, c.togetherDate FROM users u LEFT JOIN couples c ON u.id = c.user1Id OR u.id = c.user2Id WHERE u.email IN ('yejunchao@1228.com', 'zoujiafei@0219.com') ORDER BY u.email;
